name: Run and Jump Little Vico
description:
Little Vico is an alien who finds himself on a planet where there are tests of devices for changing gravity.


The alien Vic will have to run and jump over dangerous saws, change gravity and walk on walls and ceilings. Vic is very fast, light and an alien capable of traveling long distances, thanks to not much body weight and strong bones, able to fall from a great height without damage.



Features of the game:
  • A lot of jumping and moving in the horizontal and vertical direction
  • Teleports!
  • Levers and switches.
  • Physics and the change of gravity.
